actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to establish a P.L. 480 food reserve for famine relief and other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to establish and maintain a Public Law 480 (Food for Peace) reserve of wheat, rice, and feed grains, not to exceed 7.5 million tons (MTGE) in order to insure adequate supplies for famine relief or to meet export sales program levels.

titles.title: A bill to establish a P.L. 480 food reserve for famine relief and other purposes.
